<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">/// template type deduction to construct the appropriate instance of the</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">/// format&#95;hex - Output \\p N as a fixed width hexadecimal. If number will not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">/// fit in width, full number is still printed.  Examples:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex(255, 4)              =&gt; 255</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex(255, 4, true)        =&gt; 255</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex(255, 6)              =&gt; 255</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex(255, 2)              =&gt; 255</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a90c017a4d672e046b7e98f67edf082ec"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formattednumber">FormattedNumber</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a90c017a4d672e046b7e98f67edf082ec">format&#95;hex</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Width,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6893db19648a2dba0912d181aaa57ec0a19de5b94f7b83900d4b296d9fa491aec">Upper</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Width &lt;= 18 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;hex width must be &lt;= 18&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">/// format&#95;hex&#95;no&#95;prefix - Output \\p N as a fixed width hexadecimal. Does not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">/// prepend &#39;0x&#39; to the outputted string.  If number will not fit in width,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="comment">/// full number is still printed.  Examples:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="comment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex&#95;no&#95;prefix(255, 2)              =&gt; ff</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex&#95;no&#95;prefix(255, 2, true)        =&gt; FF</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="comment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex&#95;no&#95;prefix(255, 4)              =&gt; 00ff</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="comment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex&#95;no&#95;prefix(255, 1)              =&gt; ff</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">/// format&#95;decimal - Output \\p N as a right justified, fixed-width decimal. If</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">/// number will not fit in width, full number is still printed.  Examples:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;decimal(12345, 3) =&gt; &quot;12345&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
